vote.text: Amendment SA 2706 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2706 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson. (consideration: CR S7052; text: CR S7052) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2706 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Isakson.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2706 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
